name: Nobunaga no Yabou Online: Tenka Mugen no Shou
name_original: Nobunaga no Yabou Online: Tenka Mugen no Shou
description:
Nobunaga no Yabou Online: Tenka Mugen no Shou is a strategy game developed by Koei Tecmo. It came out on 10-07-2013. Koei Tecmo Games published the game.
You can play Nobunaga no Yabou Online: Tenka Mugen no Shou on PC, PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 4.
